front-matter:
unfoldingWord | OL FRI BAIBEL STORI

<font inherit/inherit;;inherit;;inherit>I nogat tambu long liklik piksa-Baibel long kainkain tokples</font>

__http://openbiblestories.com__

Ol Fri Baibel Stori, Inglis, v. 3.2

Ol i wokim long Distant Shores Media

(http://distantshores.org) na Door43 world mission community (http://door43.org).

<font inherit/inherit;;inherit;;inherit>Sekim Levol 3</font>

Na painim aut moa long https://unfoldingWord.org/quality

Laisens:

Dispela wok ol i mekim I kamap redi aninit long Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License (http://creativecommons.org/license/bysa/4.0/).

Yu fri long:

. Long yusim – yu ken wokim kopi i go bikpela o liklik long salim i go aut gen

Mekim i kamap gutpela: yu ken miksim na senisim antap long dispela buk long wokim arapela samting na  long wokim mani.

Aninit long ol dispela tingting:

. Luksave – yu mas toksave long dispela wok olsem, namba wan wok em i stap long http://openbiblestories.com . Tok bilong luksave long olgeta wok i wokim bihain em i no tok, mipela i tok orait long yu long taim yu yusim dispela wok.

                             . Skelim wankain – sapos yu laik tanim gen na senisim o putim sampela moa antap long dispela wok, yu mas tilim dispela wok bilong yu aninit long dispela laisens long wok yu bin wokim pastaim.

<font inherit/inherit;;inherit;;inherit>Long yusim trademarks: unfoldingWord em i trademark bilong Distant Shores Media na em i noken i stap insait taim yu kisim long narapela na yu mekim wok antap long dispela buk. Unaltered content from</font> http://openbiblestories.com<font inherit/inherit;;inherit;;inherit>i mas i stap insait long unfoldingWord logo taim salim i go aut long ol arapela. Tasol sapos yu senisim sampela samting insait long buk, yu mas rausim dispela unfoldingWord logo pastaim long yu givim buk bilong yu i go aut.</font>

<font inherit/inherit;;inherit;;inherit>Luksave bilong ol piksa: Olgeta piksa i stap insait long dispela stori em  Sweet Publishing (</font> www.sweetpublishing.com<font inherit/inherit;;inherit;;inherit>) mekim redi aninit long Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike License (</font> http://creativecommons.org/license/by-sa/3.o<font inherit/inherit;;inherit;;inherit>)</font>

<font inherit/inherit;;inherit;;inherit>Long ol brata na susa bilong yumi insait long krais, long olgeta hap graun na ol sios long olgeta hap. Em i prea bilong mipela long God i ken yusim dispela stori piksa buk long Tok bilong Em long blesim yu na strongim yu long sanap strong.</font>
name: Open Bible Stories
tagline: an unrestricted visual mini-Bible in any language
